description: Update a material transaction cost code allocation

flags.description: Cost code allocation details JSON array
flags.name: --details
flags.validation: JSON array of allocation objects; cannot be empty when provided (example: [{"cost_code_id":"456","percentage":1}]).

permissions: Admins may update allocations. Non-admin users may update allocations only when they are members of the allocation's customer.
side_effects: Updates allocation details and, after commit, touches the related job production plan and refreshes derived project phase cost item actuals.
validation_notes: Argument <id> is required. At least one attribute must be provided. If --details is provided it must be non-empty. Details must be a JSON array with at least one allocation. Each allocation may only include cost_code_id, percentage, and project_cost_classification_id. cost_code_id is required and must reference an existing cost code that belongs to the allocation's customer. percentage must be between 0 and 1, and the total percentage across allocations must equal 100%. Duplicate cost_code_id entries are not allowed.
